title: Me Squared
description: Hildan Hegennerry was an ordinary kid- he had good parents, a great best friend, and a clone. Well, that part's not so ordinary, is it?  Join Hildan on an action-packed adventure as he unveils dark secrets and discovers what it's like to have a brother.  Me Squared is more than an adventure- it also tackles some very important issues regarding bioethics and human cloning- whether anybody likes it or not, the future is coming, and with it come questions without obvious answers. Me Squared dares you to begin thinking about those questions right now.
author: Jourdan Cameron
